channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows

item.title: CVE-2022-42470|2024-10-23T14:29:44.829Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A relative path traversal vulnerability in Fortinet FortiClient (Windows) 7.0.0 - 7.0.7, 6.4.0 - 6.4.9, 6.2.0 - 6.2.9 and 6.0.0 - 6.0.10 allows an attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via sending a crafted request to a specific named pipe.

item.title: CVE-2022-40682|2024-10-23T14:29:52.549Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A incorrect authorization in Fortinet FortiClient (Windows) 7.0.0 - 7.0.7, 6.4.0 - 6.4.9, 6.2.0 - 6.2.9 and 6.0.0 - 6.0.10 allows an attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via sending a crafted request to a specific named pipe.

item.title: CVE-2022-43946|2024-10-23T14:28:47.955Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: Multiple vulnerabilities including an incorrect permission assignment for critical resource [CWE-732] vulnerability and a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition [CWE-367]Â vulnerability in Fortinet FortiClientWindows before 7.0.7 allows attackers on the same file sharing network to execute commands via writing data into a windows pipe.
